item.name: Portfolio Sections
item.description: Dynamic Portfolio CMS API - Manage portfolio sections, items, and fields

query.description: Filter by type: single or repeater (optional)

request.description: Fetch public sections for a specific user's portfolio. No authentication required.
List all sections for the authenticated user (includes inactive sections)
Get a specific section with ownership verification
Create a new section. user_id is automatically set from JWT token.
Update a section with ownership verification
Delete a section (cascades to items and fields)
Add a content item to a section. Validates required fields based on section type.
Update an item with ownership verification
Update a specific field value. Field type validation is enforced (URLs must be HTTPS, emails must be valid format).
Update sort_order for multiple items in a section
